data.actual_result: The server icon still follows the cursor ingame until the overlay is opened again
data.expected_result: The server reordering is cancelled when the overlay is closed
data.short_description: Closing the overlay while dragging a server causes the server icon to still follow the cursor ingame
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the overlay - Start dragging a server in your server list - Close the overlay while still dragging the server - Observe
